message: Hey Bob, I have a fantastic product for you that I think you'll really love. I'm offering it to you for $120. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $90 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down to $105.  It's a fair price for a quality product. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $105, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $95. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
